title: SOLD T200 Fatima Philadelphia Athletics, American League, HOFers x 5

posts.post_title: SOLD T200 Fatima Philadelphia Athletics, American League, HOFers x 5
posts.post_content:
Please see the attached pictures of the T200 of Connie Mack's Philadelphia Athletics.

Mack, Plank, Bender, Collins, and Baker are present.  Five HOFers on one card isn't too shabby.  :)

Price is $SOLD shipped.  Please send me a PM if interested.  Thank you.
